description.ko: 날카로운 기하학적 형태와 디지털 불안정성이 충돌하여 현대적 미니멀리즘을 재정의하는 역동적인 글리치 미학을 보여주는 KURO-X의 시각적 표현입니다.
description.en: A visual representation of KURO-X where sharp geometric forms collide with digital instability, creating a dynamic glitch aesthetic that redefines modern minimalism.

prompt: A futuristic abstract visual for KURO-X, geometric glitch art style, sharp polygons, digital artifacts, chromatic aberration, deep black background, minimalist neon accents, tech-noir aesthetic, 8k resolution, high contrast.
